attributes.action: come clean and admit that by removing the personal allowance from those earning over £100,000 it is creating two 60% tax bands. Then propose a fairer system that doesn't unfairly penalise those earning 106,500 compared to those earning £139,000!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The removal of personal allowance from those earning over £100,000 at a rate of £1 less for every £2 earned creates an effective marginal tax band of 60%. The leaked headline top tax band of 45% for those earning over £150,000 was designed to distract attention from this more ferocious tax on those less likely to be able to avoid tax. The government should look to create a system whereby the percentage of income tax goes up more smoothly the more you earn, not one where it goes up and down dramatically as is the case with this.
